title: Improved PCOS symptoms correlate with gut bacterial composition

title_detail.value: Improved PCOS symptoms correlate with gut bacterial composition

summary: Symptoms of polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) improved with exposure to healthy bacteria in the gut, according to a study in a mouse model of this common women's endocrine disorder.

summary_detail.value: Symptoms of polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) improved with exposure to healthy bacteria in the gut, according to a study in a mouse model of this common women's endocrine disorder.
